                  Training/Workshops/Study Tours
                                                                                                       845.41              16.43%
                  THIS CATEGORY CONSISTS OF TWO TYPES OF EXPENSE:
Implementing 4 training courses for primary level chosen doctor (CD) teams. Thus, the
remaining required 120 CD teams outside Podgorica (1 team=1 doctor+1 nurse) would be
trained for purposes of finalizing the PHC CD concept implementation on the national level .
So far, ( within the existing credit ) 6 courses have been conducted and 135 teams trained
(85 from PG and 50 outside PG) and additional 28 nurses , whereas conducting the 7th                  700.00
course is planned in the period Sep 24-Dec 18,2009 ( by the conclusion of the current
project ).
Note: for purposes of conducting one course 109 local educators and theoretical lectirers
 need to be hired (58 doctors and 51 nurse) for different teaching sections of the curriculum.
Study tours, workshops and seminars under the activities 1) network of health institutions ,
2) developing norms and standards for II and III level , 3) basic benefits package for II and         145.41
III level, 4) private public integration and 5) national health account.
